Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.item

Class Item

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.item.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boat, Food, Key, Resin, RoomKey, Rope, Sail, Timber, Weapon
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
Class Item - an item in the game. An "Item" represents a individual unit that the player can use for a specific purpose. Items can be found in "Rooms" of the game. All items can be taken into the "Player"s inventory.
Version:
17.05.2020
Author:
Philipp Schneider

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(java.lang.String name, float weight)
      Create an item that is described with "name" and has a specific weight. The name and weight of an item can not be changed later anymore.
      Parameters:
      name - The item's name.
      weight - The item's weight.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of an item as a string. (the one thats was definied in the constructor).

    • getWeight

      Returns:
      The weight of an item as a float.
